Name: Disease or medical condition
Description: This type also includes medical conditions such as injuries, disabilities, disorders, syndromes, etc. that affect the normal functioning of a person, whether physically or mentally.

Properties.Name: Includes Diseases
Properties.Description: Diseases that are part of or a type of this disease. For example, cancer includes breast cancer.

Properties.Name: Prevention factors
Properties.Description: Ways of preventing a disease, including vaccines and precautions such as hand washing.

Properties.Name: Risk Factors
Properties.Description: Predisposing factors, including genetic, environmental, and lifestyle risk factors.

Properties.Name: Treatments
Properties.Description: Medical treatments, such as drugs and procedures to target the illness.

Properties.Name: Trials
Properties.Description: Medical trials targeting the detection and/or treatment of this disease.

Properties.Name: Associated medical specialty
Properties.Description: Medical specialty associated with this disease. Oncology is an associated medical specialty of cancer.
